attributes.name: Organization
attributes.description: The organization represents a single church. Every other resource is scoped to this record.

attributes.name: time_zone
attributes.description: The time zone of the organization.

attributes.name: events
attributes.details: events for all groups in this organization

scopes.name: group
scopes.scope_help:
from specific groups; provide an additional `group_id` param
as a comma-separated list of IDs, ex: `?filter=group&group_id=1,2,3`

scopes.name: group_type
scopes.scope_help:
from specific group types; provide an additional `group_type_id` param
as a comma-separated list of IDs, ex: `?filter=group_type&group_type_id=1,2,3`

scopes.name: my_groups
scopes.scope_help: only group events of which you are a member

scopes.name: not_canceled
scopes.scope_help: does not have a `canceled_at` date and time

attributes.name: group_applications
attributes.details: requests to join groups for this organization

scopes.name: church_center_visible
scopes.scope_help: contains groups which are published to Church Center

scopes.name: not_church_center_visible
scopes.scope_help: does not contain any groups published to Church Center

scopes.name: campus
scopes.scope_help:
from specific campuses; provide an additional `campus_id` param
as a comma-separated list of IDs, ex: `?filter=campus&campus_id=1,2,3`

scopes.name: group
scopes.scope_help:
from specific groups; provide an additional `group_id` param
as a comma-separated list of IDs, ex: `?filter=group&group_id=1,2,3`

scopes.name: group_type
scopes.scope_help:
from specific group types; provide an additional `group_type_id` param
as a comma-separated list of IDs, ex: `?filter=group_type&group_type_id=1,2,3`

scopes.name: my_groups
scopes.scope_help: only groups of which you are a member

scopes.name: people_database_searchable
scopes.scope_help:
based on their setting of allowing leaders to search the entire
church database in Groups; provide an additional
`people_database_searchable` param with `only` or `none`,
ex: `?filter=people_database_searchable&people_database_searchable=only`

attributes.name: per_page
attributes.description: how many records to return per page (min=1, max=100, default=25)
